<div id="comment-est-organis√©e-la-traduction" class="section level2">
<h2>Comment est organis√©e la traduction</h2>
<p><strong>Note importante</strong> : Pensez √† √™tre bien vigilant sur l‚Äôharmonisation des code-langues. En d‚Äôautres termes, si l‚Äôon ajoute une langue avec le code <code>es</code>, ce code doit √™tre strictement resp√©ct√© partout, sinon la traduction ne pourra pas √™tre effectu√©e correctement dans l‚Äôapplication.</p>
<div id="pour-les-help-bubble" class="section level3">
<h3>Pour les ‚Äúhelp bubble‚Äù</h3>
<p>Les help bubbles sont les √©l√©ments d‚Äôaide lors du passage de la souris sur un √©l√©ment <code>(?)</code>.</p>
<p>Ils sont tous dans <code>inst/translation_help</code>. Ce dossier contient des sous-dossiers, chacun correspondant √† une bulle d‚Äôaide. Chacun de ces sous dossiers contient des <code>.md</code>, un par code-langue. Vous pouvez utiliser du code Markdown afin de remplir ces √©l√©ments.</p>
<p>Ces contenus sont ensuite compil√©s dans <code>inst/translation_help.csv</code>, via le code ci-dessous, √† relancer en cas de changement.</p>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb3"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb3-1"><a href="#cb3-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="fu">unlink</span>(<span class="st">&quot;inst/translation_help.csv&quot;</span>)</span>
<span id="cb3-2"><a href="#cb3-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb3-3"><a href="#cb3-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>purrr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">map_df</span>(</span>
<span id="cb3-4"><a href="#cb3-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">list.files</span>(</span>
<span id="cb3-5"><a href="#cb3-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="st">&quot;inst/translation_help&quot;</span>,</span>
<span id="cb3-6"><a href="#cb3-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="at">full.names =</span> <span class="cn">TRUE</span></span>
<span id="cb3-7"><a href="#cb3-7" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  ), <span class="sc">~</span> {</span>
<span id="cb3-8"><a href="#cb3-8" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="fu">data.frame</span>(</span>
<span id="cb3-9"><a href="#cb3-9" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>      <span class="at">entry =</span> <span class="fu">basename</span>(.x),</span>
<span id="cb3-10"><a href="#cb3-10" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>      <span class="at">en =</span> htmltools<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">includeMarkdown</span>(</span>
<span id="cb3-11"><a href="#cb3-11" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>        <span class="fu">file.path</span>(.x, <span class="st">&quot;en.md&quot;</span>)</span>
<span id="cb3-12"><a href="#cb3-12" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>      ),</span>
<span id="cb3-13"><a href="#cb3-13" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>      <span class="at">fr =</span> htmltools<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">includeMarkdown</span>(</span>
<span id="cb3-14"><a href="#cb3-14" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>        <span class="fu">file.path</span>(.x, <span class="st">&quot;fr.md&quot;</span>)</span>
<span id="cb3-15"><a href="#cb3-15" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>      )</span>
<span id="cb3-16"><a href="#cb3-16" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    )</span>
<span id="cb3-17"><a href="#cb3-17" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  }</span>
<span id="cb3-18"><a href="#cb3-18" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb3-19"><a href="#cb3-19" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  readr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">write_csv</span>(<span class="st">&quot;inst/translation_help.csv&quot;</span>)</span></code></pre></div>

<div id="pour-le-front-end" class="section level3">
<h3>Pour le front-end</h3>
<p>Pour l‚Äôinterface utilisateur, l‚Äôapplication met ensemble des fichiers CSV, contenus dans le dossier <code>inst/</code> et des tables contenues dans la base. Certains de ces fichiers sont automatiquement g√©n√©r√©s, un est √† modifier √† la main.</p>
<p>Tous ces fichiers contiennent au moins 3 colonnes:</p>
<ul>
<li><code>entry</code> : la cl√© d‚Äôentr√©e dans le front (pour i18n)</li>
<li><code>en</code> : la traduction en anglais</li>
<li><code>fr</code> : la traduction en fran√ßais</li>
</ul>
</div>

<span id="cb4-4"><a href="#cb4-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="fu">get_con</span>(session),</span>
<span id="cb4-5"><a href="#cb4-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="st">&quot;select abundance_level_name AS entry, abundance_level_interpretation_short AS en from abundance_level&quot;</span></span>
<span id="cb4-6"><a href="#cb4-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="co"># &quot;select abundance_level_name AS entry, abundance_level_interpretation_short AS en, diadesatlas.translate(abundance_level_interpretation_short, &#39;fr&#39;) AS fr from abundance_level&quot;</span></span>
<span id="cb4-7"><a href="#cb4-7" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  ) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>

<span id="cb4-17"><a href="#cb4-17" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    )</span>

<span id="cb6-11"><a href="#cb6-11" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    DBI<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">dbGetQuery</span>(</span>
<span id="cb6-12"><a href="#cb6-12" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>      <span class="fu">get_con</span>(session),</span>
<span id="cb6-13"><a href="#cb6-13" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>      <span class="st">&quot;SELECT</span></span>

<span id="cb6-18"><a href="#cb6-18" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    ),</span>
<span id="cb6-19"><a href="#cb6-19" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    DBI<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">dbGetQuery</span>(</span>

<span id="cb6-21"><a href="#cb6-21" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>      <span class="st">&quot;SELECT</span></span>

<span id="cb6-26"><a href="#cb6-26" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    ),</span>
<span id="cb6-27"><a href="#cb6-27" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    DBI<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">dbGetQuery</span>(</span>

<div id="fichiers-g√©n√©r√©s-automatiquement" class="section level3">
<h3>Fichiers g√©n√©r√©s automatiquement</h3>
<ul>
<li><code>translation_iucn.csv</code> : contient les traductions pour status IUCN. Se g√©n√®re via le code suivant <strong>mais devra √™tre mis dans la base</strong>.</li>
</ul>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb7"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb7-1"><a href="#cb7-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># </span><span class="al">TODO</span><span class="co"> : get the translation inside the DB</span></span>
<span id="cb7-2"><a href="#cb7-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># On utilise ici la description trouv√©e sur</span></span>
<span id="cb7-3"><a href="#cb7-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># https://uicn.fr/liste-rouge-mondiale/</span></span>
<span id="cb7-4"><a href="#cb7-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>desc <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">strsplit</span>(</span>
<span id="cb7-5"><a href="#cb7-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="st">&quot;√âteinte (EX), √âteinte √† l‚Äô√©tat sauvage (EW), En danger critique (CR), En danger (EN), Vuln√©rable (VU), Quasi menac√©e (NT), Pr√©occupation mineure (LC), Donn√©es insuffisantes (DD), Non √©valu√©e (NE)&quot;</span>,</span>
<span id="cb7-6"><a href="#cb7-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">split =</span> <span class="st">&quot;, &quot;</span></span>
<span id="cb7-7"><a href="#cb7-7" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>)[[<span class="dv">1</span>]]</span>
<span id="cb7-8"><a href="#cb7-8" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb7-9"><a href="#cb7-9" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>french_iucn <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">data.frame</span>(</span>
<span id="cb7-10"><a href="#cb7-10" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">fr_vals =</span> <span class="fu">gsub</span>(</span>
<span id="cb7-11"><a href="#cb7-11" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="st">&quot;([^</span><span class="sc">\\</span><span class="st">(]+) </span><span class="sc">\\</span><span class="st">(([^</span><span class="sc">\\</span><span class="st">(]+)</span><span class="sc">\\</span><span class="st">)&quot;</span>,</span>
<span id="cb7-12"><a href="#cb7-12" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="st">&quot;</span><span class="sc">\\</span><span class="st">1,</span><span class="sc">\\</span><span class="st">2&quot;</span>,</span>
<span id="cb7-13"><a href="#cb7-13" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    desc</span>
<span id="cb7-14"><a href="#cb7-14" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  )</span>
<span id="cb7-15"><a href="#cb7-15" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb7-16"><a href="#cb7-16" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  tidyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">separate</span>(</span>
<span id="cb7-17"><a href="#cb7-17" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    fr_vals,</span>
<span id="cb7-18"><a href="#cb7-18" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="at">into =</span> <span class="fu">c</span>(<span class="st">&quot;fr&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;entry&quot;</span>), <span class="at">sep =</span> <span class="st">&quot;,&quot;</span></span>
<span id="cb7-19"><a href="#cb7-19" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  )</span>
<span id="cb7-20"><a href="#cb7-20" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb7-21"><a href="#cb7-21" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>en_iucn <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> DBI<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">dbGetQuery</span>(</span>
<span id="cb7-22"><a href="#cb7-22" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">get_con</span>(se),</span>
<span id="cb7-23"><a href="#cb7-23" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="st">&quot;SELECT distinct iucn_level_code AS entry,iucn_level_name AS en FROM v_iucn&quot;</span></span>
<span id="cb7-24"><a href="#cb7-24" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>)</span>
<span id="cb7-25"><a href="#cb7-25" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb7-26"><a href="#cb7-26" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>en_iucn <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb7-27"><a href="#cb7-27" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  dplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">full_join</span>(french_iucn) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb7-28"><a href="#cb7-28" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  readr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">write_csv</span>(<span class="st">&quot;inst/translation_iucn.csv&quot;</span>)</span></code></pre></div>
</div>
<div id="fichier-√†-compl√©ter-√†-la-main" class="section level3">
<h3>Fichier √† compl√©ter √† la main</h3>
<p><strong>IMPORTANT</strong> Merci de centraliser dans le Google Sheet.</p>
<ul>
<li>On va lire le fichier Google Sheet de traduction.</li>
</ul>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb8"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb8-1"><a href="#cb8-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="fu">library</span>(googlesheets4)</span>
<span id="cb8-2"><a href="#cb8-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>sheet_url <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">readline</span>(<span class="st">&quot;Enter the sheet url: &quot;</span>)</span>
<span id="cb8-3"><a href="#cb8-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>translation <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">read_sheet</span>(sheet_url)</span>
<span id="cb8-4"><a href="#cb8-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb8-5"><a href="#cb8-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>translation<span class="sc">$</span>DESCRIPTION <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="cn">NULL</span></span>
<span id="cb8-6"><a href="#cb8-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb8-7"><a href="#cb8-7" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>translation</span></code></pre></div>
<p>V√©rifier (et manipulez) le dataframe au besoin. Ce dernier doit poss√©der √† minima :</p>
<ul>
<li>Une premi√®re colonne nomm√©e ‚Äòentry‚Äô</li>
<li>Une seconde colonne nomm√©e ‚Äòen‚Äô</li>
<li>Une troisis√®me colonne nomm√©e ‚Äòfr‚Äô</li>
<li>D‚Äôautres langues (potentiellement)</li>
<li>PAS DE COLONNES VIDES SUR LA DROITE, pensez √† l‚Äôanti-s√©lectionner au besoin</li>
</ul>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb9"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb9-1"><a href="#cb9-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>readr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">write_csv</span>(</span>
<span id="cb9-2"><a href="#cb9-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  translation,</span>
<span id="cb9-3"><a href="#cb9-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="st">&quot;inst/translation.csv&quot;</span></span>
<span id="cb9-4"><a href="#cb9-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>)</span></code></pre></div>
<p>Vous pouvez v√©rifier l‚Äôint√©grit√© du csv :</p>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb10"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb10-1"><a href="#cb10-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>output <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">check_translation_csv</span>(<span class="st">&quot;inst/translation.csv&quot;</span>)</span>
<span id="cb10-2"><a href="#cb10-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="fu">head</span>(output)</span></code></pre></div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="ajouter-une-nouvelle-langue" class="section level2">
<h2>Ajouter une nouvelle langue</h2>
<p>Ajouter une nouvelle langue doit se faire aux emplacements suivants:</p>
<div id="help-bubbles" class="section level3">
<h3>Help bubbles</h3>
<ul>
<li><p>Pour chaque sous-dossiers, ajouter un fichier <code>.md</code> avec la traduction dans une nouvelle langue.</p></li>
<li><p>R√©g√©nerer <code>translation_help.csv</code> : dans le code de g√©n√©ration de la premi√®re partie de ce Rmd, remplacer avec un code type</p></li>
</ul>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb11"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb11-1"><a href="#cb11-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="fu">data.frame</span>(</span>
<span id="cb11-2"><a href="#cb11-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">entry =</span> <span class="fu">basename</span>(.x),</span>
<span id="cb11-3"><a href="#cb11-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">en =</span> htmltools<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">includeMarkdown</span>(</span>
<span id="cb11-4"><a href="#cb11-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="fu">file.path</span>(.x, <span class="st">&quot;en.md&quot;</span>)</span>
<span id="cb11-5"><a href="#cb11-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  ),</span>
<span id="cb11-6"><a href="#cb11-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">fr =</span> htmltools<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">includeMarkdown</span>(</span>
<span id="cb11-7"><a href="#cb11-7" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="fu">file.path</span>(.x, <span class="st">&quot;fr.md&quot;</span>)</span>
<span id="cb11-8"><a href="#cb11-8" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  ),</span>
<span id="cb11-9"><a href="#cb11-9" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="co"># Code pour la nouvelle langue</span></span>
<span id="cb11-10"><a href="#cb11-10" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">es =</span> htmltools<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">includeMarkdown</span>(</span>
<span id="cb11-11"><a href="#cb11-11" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="fu">file.path</span>(.x, <span class="st">&quot;es.md&quot;</span>)</span>
<span id="cb11-12"><a href="#cb11-12" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  )</span>
<span id="cb11-13"><a href="#cb11-13" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>)</span></code></pre></div>
</div>
<div id="data" class="section level3">
<h3>Data</h3>
<ul>
<li><p>Fichier Google Sheet, ajouter une nouvelle colonne √† droite (exemple <code>es</code>)</p></li>
<li><p><code>translation_iucn.csv</code> : dans le code de g√©n√©ration du dessus, il faudra cr√©er un nouveau data.frame, avec les traductions.</p></li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p>Note : ces traductions devront √† termes √™tre int√©gr√©es √† la base</p>
</blockquote>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb12"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb12-1"><a href="#cb12-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>es_iucn <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">data.frame</span>(</span>
<span id="cb12-2"><a href="#cb12-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">entry =</span> <span class="fu">c</span>(<span class="st">&quot;EX&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;EW&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;CR&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;EN&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;VU&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;NT&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;LC&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;DD&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;NE&quot;</span>),</span>
<span id="cb12-3"><a href="#cb12-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">es =</span> <span class="fu">c</span>(<span class="st">&quot;&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;&quot;</span>)</span>
<span id="cb12-4"><a href="#cb12-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>)</span></code></pre></div>
<p>puis mettre √† jour le code du d√©but de ce Rmd.</p>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb13"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb13-1"><a href="#cb13-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>en_iucn <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb13-2"><a href="#cb13-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  dplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">full_join</span>(french_iucn) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb13-3"><a href="#cb13-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  dplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">full_join</span>(es_iucn) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb13-4"><a href="#cb13-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  readr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">write_csv</span>(<span class="st">&quot;inst/translation_iucn.csv&quot;</span>)</span></code></pre></div>
</div>
<div id="fonction-dbb" class="section level3">
<h3>Fonction dbb</h3>
<p>Ces fonctions sont dans <code>R/utils_helpers.R</code></p>
<p>Les fonctions qui utilisent la traduction dans la bdd sont les suivantes :</p>
<ul>
<li><p><code>translation_abundance_level()</code> : il faudra ajouter une partie au SQL type <code>diadesatlas.translate(abundance_level_interpretation_short, &#39;es&#39;) AS es</code></p></li>
<li><p><code>translation_species()</code> : il faudra ajouter une partie au SQL type <code>diadesatlas.translate(english_name, &#39;es&#39;) AS es</code></p></li>
<li><p><code>translation_v_ecosystemic_services()</code> pour chaque sous requ√™te SQL, il faudra ajouter une partie au SQL type <code>diadesatlas.translate(subcategory_name, &#39;es&#39;) as es</code></p></li>
</ul>
</div>
<div id="c√¥t√©-code-de-lapplication" class="section level3">
<h3>C√¥t√© code de l‚Äôapplication</h3>
<ul>
<li><p>Si disponible, ajouter le langage dans <code>get_dt_lg()</code> , √† v√©rifier sur <a href="https://cdn.datatables.net/plug-ins/1.10.11/i18n/" class="uri">https://cdn.datatables.net/plug-ins/1.10.11/i18n/</a></p></li>
<li><p>Dans <code>R/app_ui.R</code>, ajouter une entr√©e pour le s√©lecteur de langue. Si votre entr√©e de laangue est <code>es</code>, ajouter <code>&lt;option value=&quot;en&quot;&gt;\U0001f1ea\U0001f1f8 Espanol&lt;/option&gt;</code>. Le code unicode s‚Äôobtient en utilisant l‚Äô√©moji et <code>stringi::stri_escape_unicode(&quot;üá™üá∏&quot;)</code>.</p></li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
<div id="notes-pour-les-d√©velopeurs" class="section level2">
<h2>Notes pour les d√©velopeurs</h2>
<div id="comment-cr√©er-un-nouvel-√©l√©ment-traductible-dans-lui" class="section level3">
<h3>Comment cr√©er un nouvel √©l√©ment ‚Äútraductible‚Äù dans l‚ÄôUI</h3>
<ul>
<li>La traduction est assur√©e par le module JS <code>i18n</code> et la fonction <code>with_i18()</code> dans l‚Äôapp</li>
</ul>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb14"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb14-1"><a href="#cb14-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="fu">with_i18</span>(</span>
<span id="cb14-2"><a href="#cb14-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="st">&quot;Text de base&quot;</span>,</span>
<span id="cb14-3"><a href="#cb14-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="st">&quot;text_de_base&quot;</span></span>
<span id="cb14-4"><a href="#cb14-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>)</span></code></pre></div>
<p>Va cr√©er <code>&lt;span data-i18n=&quot;text_de_base&quot;&gt;Text de base&lt;/span&gt;</code>.</p>
<ul>
<li>L‚Äô√©l√©ment <code>Text de base</code> est affich√© si <code>i18n</code> plante</li>
<li>L‚Äô√©l√©ment <code>data-i18n=&quot;text_de_base&quot;</code> correspond √† la cl√© d‚Äôentr√©e dans le data.frame de traduction, i.e.¬†la valeur dans la colonne entry.</li>
</ul>
<p>Sch√©matiquement, lorsque le JavaScript va traduire la page, il va aller chercher pour chaque tag l‚Äôentr√©e <code>data-i18n</code>, en tirer la valeur, et aller chercher la traduction correspondante.</p>
<p>Par exemple, si nous traduisons en ‚Äúfr‚Äù, la localisation fait (en JavaScript) l‚Äôaction suivante</p>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb15"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb15-1"><a href="#cb15-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>df_traduction <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb15-2"><a href="#cb15-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">filter</span>(entry <span class="sc">==</span> <span class="st">&quot;text_de_base&quot;</span>) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb15-3"><a href="#cb15-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">pull</span>(fr)</span></code></pre></div>
</div>
